name: Heresay
body:
### Welcome to HereSay
HereSay is  a location-based realtime, social news application to discover what is happening around you.   You can explore content by traversing the map view and selecting a categorised tagged post or search through recent posts which occurred within a five kilometre radius of your current location.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
